Detailed Description

Helper utilities for enabling crypto.

Revision

Function Documentation

uint64_t cvmx_crypto_dormant_dbg ( void   ) 

Read the crypto dormant debug value.

Returns:
The RNM_EER_DBG.DAT value, or zero if the feature is not enabled.
int cvmx_crypto_dormant_enable ( uint64_t  key  ) 

Enable the dormant crypto functions.

If crypto is not already enabled and it is possible to enable it, write the enable key.

Parameters:
key The dormant crypto enable key value.
Returns:
true if crypto is (or has been) enabled.
